bibl.title: Locating the Harbour: Myos Hormos / Quseir al Qadim: a Roman and Islamic Port on the Red Sea Coast of Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais
bibl.note: Location and previous research. - Methodological approach. - Identification of the Roman harbour. - Sedimentary analysis. - Description of the Roman harbour. - Description of the Islamic harbour. - Maritime finds. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Blue Lucy, Locating the Harbour: Myos Hormos / Quseir al Qadim: a Roman and Islamic Port on the Red Sea Coast of Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais
IJNA 36 (2007) pp. 265-281, 13 figg. n./bl. et coul.

Location and previous research. - Methodological approach. - Identification of the Roman harbour. - Sedimentary analysis. - Description of the Roman harbour. - Description of the Islamic harbour. - Maritime finds. - Conclusions.
